title: Did President Trump reverse the ban on pesticides after he received $1 million from Dao for chemicals?
subtitle: The Trump Administration has reflected a previous decision to ban the use of common insecticides and has received funds from the chemical plant.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Environmental Protection Agency was to prohibit the use of chlorpyrifos, an insecticide allegedly originating in Nazi Germany, because of health and environmental safety concerns; however, President Trump reversed this decision after Dow Chemicals, a chemical manufacturer, donated $1 million to his installation fund.
